name: HUE Trials - Bacteria Adventure
description:
IMPORTANT - IF YOU'RE ON MOBILE:

  1. Set your browser to open the page as Destop.
  2. Start the game, just refresh if it crashes.
  3. Expand the game to fullscreen.
  4. Switch to landscape orientation.

IF YOU'RE ON PC:

 HUE Trials was made for mobile, but supports mouse and keyboard. Because of a mobile focus it looks better on smaller screens, so you might want to avoid fullscreen on large monitors.

Adventure as a bacteria and solve puzzles to cure the world of a deadly parasite.

Jump, swap, and flip through challenging levels while discovering new colors along the way.

Try the Infinity mode for some endless fun, or make your own levels in the Create mode and share them.

It may seem simple at first, but JUST WAIT until you run into more colors!

Have fun in whatever mode you want:

>>>Bacteria Adventure Mode

A scientist looks for redemption in his most recent attempt at a cure.

Jump into the various trials and stages of testing as the bacteria itself.

Overcome challenging levels and puzzles.

>>>Infinity Mode

Chase your high score in the Infinity Mode.

Jump between randomly generated platforms as the bacteria.

>>>Create Mode

Make your own fun and adventure with Create Mode.

Build custom levels by placing some of the many pieces.

Jump into levels from others by pasting their map's data.

Unity WebGL does not officially support mobile browsers, so there may be some issues I just can't fix for mobile. RIP. Currently I can't seem to copy/paste map data.
